Process Equipment

Home

>>

Process Equipment Division

Salama Engineering deals with the design and manufacture of advanced process equipment aimed at providing high performance and reliability. Products are developed strictly focusing on different industries, providing the best performance even in the most stressful conditions. Every unit of equipment is designed to maximize its function, efficiency, and minimize downtime.

At Salama, we ensure that every solution we provide is fully tailored to meet your specific requirements and offers long-term benefits. Whether you need process equipment for petrochemicals, oil and gas, water desalination and power generation, we deliver top-quality equipment with advanced designs for the processing industries.

Discover the Best from SALAMA Engineering Today!

Explore Our Products

Products

Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger

We are capable to manufacturing shell and tube heat exchangers with high quality and extensive material options i.e., CS, SS, Duplex, Super Duplex, Inconel, and titanium. Our design and fabrication facilities offer fast, efficient, and cost-effective solutions. We have in-house thermal and mechanical design experts. Our automatic tube sheet drilling equipment is accurate to ±0.01″ and up to 400mm thickness drill capacity.

We offer all standard TEMA configurations i.e., BEM, AEN, AES, NEN, BKU and BEU type designed in accordance with ASME Code, Section VIII, Division 1 & 2 and TEMA requirements. Shell sizes range from 4″ up to 110″ in diameter with up to 75mm thk. and design pressures from full vacuum to 5000 PSI.

  • FIXED TUBE SHEETS HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • FLOATING HEAD TUBE SHEET HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • U- TUBE HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • KETTLE TYPE RE-BOILER
  • COAXIAL TUBE HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • FIN TUBE HEAT EXCHANGERS
Contact Sales

Pressure Vessel

We provide a wide range of pressure vessels adhering to stringent quality and safety standards for a diverse selection of clients in the oil, gas and petrochemical industry, including:
Design ASME SEC VIII Div 1 & 2, ASME SEC II, manufacturing, and fabrication & Detailed Engineering in Horizontal / Vertical Design.

  • Pressurized Air Receiver
  • Separators, Receivers and Condensers
  • Knockout Drums
  • High Pressure Production Trap
  • Scrubber Drums
  • De-Cock Drums
Contact Sales

Fin Fan Coolers and Customized Industrial Air Coolers

Our fin fan coolers include radial and helical finned tubes with variable material options and optimized design, enabling added heat exchange capability.
We are providing retubing, cleaning and combing of fin tubes, header weld build-up for tapped plugs At Site or In-House, as per customer requirement.

We offer custom designed air-cooled system, that enhances optimum efficiency, performance, and improved reliability for electric motor applications, to overcome heated electric motors that can be inefficient, less effective, and sometime dangerous when pushed to extremes.

Through advanced computer-aided design models and manufacturing techniques, our custom capabilities are unmatched in our industry.

We manufacture:

  • High Finned Tubes Coolers
  • Condenser Type Fin Tube Coolers
  • Industrial Motor Coolers
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Shop Fabricated Tanks

We have in-house engineering and fabrication facility where we’re able to provide custom-designed storage tanks with various material options like stainless steel, carbon steel, alloy metals, and aluminum alloy for specific one-time or repetitive applications as per customer requirement and specifications to ensure safety and excellence.

Our customers represent a wide range of industries – Oil & Gas, Petro Chemicals, Power, Chemical, Plastic, etc.

The range of tanks we are proving in this region:

  • Flat bottom / Sloping Bottom with Conical Roof / Flat Roof
  • Silos & Hoppers
  • Rectangular Tanks
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Piping Spool Fabrication

We are equipped with various types, sizes and orientation of piping spool fabrication. We fabricate pipe spools for various applications in oil, gas, petrochemical, chemical and water lines.

Our welders are fully qualified on a wide range of welding specifications and materials, we have various welding procedures that are applicable to most welding applications, which include stainless steel, carbon steel, nickel alloy and duplex etc… using welding techniques i.e. SMAW, TIG, MIG.

  • Pipe Spool Skids: Different dimensions and arrangements.
  • Chemical Injection Skids: High accuracy chemical injectors.
  • Water Injection Skids: Water injection applications at best.
  • Welding Process Skids: Processes like SMAW, TIG, MIG for various materials.
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Skids

Salama Engineering Industries provides chilled water-cooling skids, chemical dosing skids, cooling, and heating water injection systems for various industrial application.

Skids are designed, engineered, fabricated, assembled & tested under one roof at our Facility.

  • Cold Water Skids: Efficient industrial water cooling solutions.
  • Chemical Dispensing Skids: Precise chemical dosing systems.
  • Water Injection Skids: Controlled water injection systems.
  • Modular Process Skids: Compact, multi-function process units.
Contact Sales
Inquire Now

Services

We offer services for Installation and Commissioning, Inspection, and Re-Tubing, all focused on ensuring the optimum performance of the equipment.

Installation

Our skilled team executes installations and maintenance with skill and precision, adhering to strict safety protocols throughout the process. We follow stringent protocols and ensure that all construction and repair work complies with design specifications and approved engineering codes. Each project is thoroughly pressure tested. The highest quality ensures safety and performance for final user acceptance.

Inspection

We begin by inspecting your process equipment to identify any issues. After the evaluation, we recommend the most suitable repairs, cleaning, services, or solutions. Upon approval, we proceed with the necessary actions in accordance with industry standards to prevent future problems and ensure long-term performance. This approach guarantees maximum efficiency and reliability.

Re - Tubing

Heat exchanger retubing servicing has been at the core of our business. With our years of experience and range of services, we are providing complete retubing, partial retubing, tube extraction, and bending services for shell and tube, fin fan cooler..etc, at Site and In-house based on customer requirements.
